message: I propose a fair split of 60/40 in my favor. Let's be reasonable and get this done quickly!
I'm willing to give you a decent share, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of. Meet me in the middle!
I'm still willing to negotiate, but I'm not going to accept a deal where I get less than 40%. Let's find a compromise that works for both of us.
I'm not budging on the 60/40 split, but I'll meet you in the middle on the amount. Take it or leave it!
